revision.text: ==Urubú-Kaapor== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|urb|/ʃiᵐbɔ/}}<ref>Lopes, page 23</ref> ===Noun=== {{head|urb|noun}} # any of various species of poisonous {{l|en|liana}} used by fishermen to kill fish in small bodies of water<ref>Lopes, page 23</ref><ref>Kakumasu and Kakumasu, page 144</ref> ===References=== * '''1988''', James Y. Kakumasu, Kiyoko Kakumasu, ''Dicionário por tópicos kaapor - português'', Associação Internacional de Lingüística SIL - Brasil. * '''2009''', Mário Alexande Garcia Lopes, ''Aspectos gramaticais da língua ka’apor'', Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais. <references /> [[Category:urb:Fishing]] [[Category:urb:Plants]]
